item.title: Lib: clock/xd
item.description: Sometimes you need to send a single pulse from one clock domain to another. This is a simple case of clock domain crossing or CDC. This post uses the xd module from the Project F Library to handle such situations simply and safely. Share your thoughts with @WillFlux on Mastodon or Twitter. If you like what I do, sponsor me. üôè Crossing the Streams The standard advice for safely handling an async signal is to pass it through a pair of flip-flops.
